description: Earthy truffle takes this simple mushroom fettuccine dish to the next level.
name: Mushroom & Truffle Fettuccine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Tip the fettuccine into the pan and toss to coat, adding starchy water as necessary. Serve with parmesan and a drizzle of truffle oil to taste.
